Company: ICS Collection Services, Inc, University of Chicago Physicians Group
Description of incident: University of Chicago Physicians Group's former contractor ICS Collection Services discovered that website users were able to view sensitive information of other users.  At least one user was able to view the names, addresses, dates of birth, insurance payments and dates, insurance company names, insurance policy numbers, procedures, diagnosis codes and descriptions, dates of service, treating physician names, and sometimes even Social Security numbers associated with University of Chicago Physicians Group patients.  ICS Collection Services learned of the issue on July 9.
